Reference

Core Geocoding Functions

Return coordinates and Census geography of American street addresses

cxy_geocode()

Batch Geocode Parsed Addresses

cxy_single()

Geocode Single Parsed Address

cxy_oneline()

Geocode Single One Line Address

Census Geography Geocoding

Return Census Geography for coordinates

cxy_geography()

Geocode Single Coordinate Pair

Additional Functions

Functions for increasing reproducibility with the Census API

cxy_benchmarks()

Get Current Valid Benchmarks

cxy_vintages()

Get Current Valid Vintages

Sample Data

Sample data for demonstrating geocoding

stl_homicides

Homicides in the City of St. Louis, 2008 - 2018

stl_homicides_small

Homicides in the City of St. Louis July, 2018
